publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-255# Mrs Margaret Ewing: Elgin Bypass-That the Parliament considers that Moray Council should make full representations to the Scottish Executive regarding proposals for an Elgin bypass; notes the economic benefits to Elgin and the north-east of Scotland as a whole that a bypass would bring, and further notes the overwhelming public support for such a project.
S2M-255# Elgin Bypass (lodged on 8 August 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-255# Elgin Bypass (lodged on 8 August 2003) Sarah Boyack*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-255# Elgin Bypass (lodged on 8 August 2003) Fiona Hyslop*, Alex Johnstone*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Brian Adam*, Maureen Macmillan*, Fergus Ewing*
S2M-255# Elgin Bypass (lodged on 8 August 2003) Richard Lochhead*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Rob Gibson*, Dr Jean Turner*, Alex Neil*
S2M-255# Elgin Bypass (lodged on 8 August 2003) Mr Bruce McFee*

S2M-255# Mrs Margaret Ewing: Elgin Bypassâ€”That the Parliament considers that Moray Council should make full representations to the Scottish Executive regarding proposals for an Elgin bypass; notes the economic benefits to Elgin and the north-east of Scotland as a whole that a bypass would bring, and further notes the overwhelming public support for such a project. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Ms Sandra White, Sarah Boyack, Michael Matheson, Fiona Hyslop, Alex Johnstone, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Brian Adam, Maureen Macmillan, Fergus Ewing, Richard Lochhead, Stewart Stevenson, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Rob Gibson, Dr Jean Turner, Alex Neil, Mr Bruce McFee
S2M-255# Elgin Bypass (lodged on 8 August 2003) Jim Mather*
